hds-tooltip-spacing.description: tooltip spacing between title & body, body & CTA

hds-tile-spacing-small.description: spacing between icon & text on small tile

hds-tile-spacing-medium.description: spacing between icon & text on medium tile

hds-section_header-safe_space.description: safe space between title/subtitle and CTA text

hds-profile_select-text-subtitle.description: profile select subtitle/relationship & additional info text style

hds-pagination-spacing-large.description: spacing between page number cells & icon prev/next

hds-navbar-height-logo.description: fixed height for HanoApp logo on navbar

hds-card-spots.description: spots width & height for vertical card

hds-banner-spacing-large.description: large spacing. usually used for safe space between title text and dismiss icon

hds-article_card-spacing.description: spacing between title, subtitle and label

hds-text_input-spacing.description: spacing among text label, input, and helper text. also used for spacing among items inside the text input

hds-text_input-area.description: default text style for input area

hds-tab_group-spacing.description: spacing among tabs in a tab group

hds-radio-spacing.description: mobile spacing between radio and text label (if available)

hds-nav_slider-area-default.description: default size for nav slider area

hds-nav_slider-area-press.description: smaller size for nav slider area when pressing

hds-links-spacing.description: mobile spacing between text link & icon

hds-links-icon_size-large.description: large icon size, pair with large text link

hds-links-icon_size-medium.description: medium icon size, pair with medium & small text link

hds-links-text-standalone_small.description: Mobile text style for small standalone link

hds-links-text-standalone_medium.description: Mobile text style for medium standalone link

hds-links-text-standalone_large.description: Mobile text style for large standalone link

hds-label-spacing.description: mobile spacing between text & icon in label

hds-chips-spacing.description: mobile spacing between text & icon in chips

hds-checkbox-spacing.description: mobile spacing between checkbox and text label (if available)

hds-button-icon_size-small.description: button icon small size. used in small button.

hds-button-icon_size-medium.description: button icon medium size. used in medium button.

hds-button-icon_size-large.description: button icon large size. used in large & x-large button.

hds-button-spacing-1.description: Spacing between items in button small & medium

hds-button-spacing-2.description: Spacing between items in button large & x-large

hds-button-padding_left_right-1.description: Left & right padding button small & medium

hds-button-padding_left_right-2.description: Left & right padding button large & x-large

hds-breadcrumb-spacing.description: mobile breadcrumb spacing between text & icon

hds-breadcrumb-text-link.description: mobile breadcrumb link & current page text style

hds-body-text_paragraph-1.description: This is style body long 1 for long paragraph more than 2 lines.

hds-body-text_compact-1.description: This is style body compact 1 for short paragraph no longer than 2 lines.

hds-body-text_paragraph-2.description: This is style body long 2 for long paragraph more than 2 lines.

hds-body-text_compact-2.description: This is style body compact 2 for short paragraph no longer than 2 lines.

hds-body-text_slashed-1.description: This is style body compact slased text 1 for short paragraph no longer than 2 lines.

hds-body-text_slashed-2.description: This is style body compact slased text 2 for short paragraph no longer than 2 lines.

hds-caption-text_slashed-1.description: This is caption semibold slashed textstyle

hds-caption-text_slashed-2.description: This is caption regular slashed textstyle

hds-display-text-1.description: This is style for Display 1 Mobile

hds-display-text-2.description: This is style for Display 2 Mobile

hds-display-text-3.description: This is style for Display 3 Mobile

hds-display-text-4.description: This is style for Display Body 1 Mobile

hds-profile_select-color-text_title.description: profile select title (profile name) text color

hds-profile_select-color-text_processing.description: profile select cta processing text color

hds-profile_select-color-text_info.description: text color for additional info line

hds-navbar-color-nav_menu_active.description: navbar menu text hover & active color

hds-dropdown-cell_spacing.description: spacing between icon & text inside the dropdown cells

hds-datepicker-cell_radius.description: border radius for date picker cell

hds-datepicker-divider.description: date picker divider between days & dates

hds-datepicker-border-cell_today.description: border size for today's date cell

hds-datepicker-color-icon_hover.description: hover icon color for navigate prev/next icon

hds-card-shadow-default.description: card default shadow. shadow only applied on clickable card.

hds-card-shadow-hover.description: card hover shadow. hover shadow only applied on clickable card.

hds-bottomsheet-border_radius.description: bottomsheet border radius top left & right

hds-banner-color-critical.description: banner background color for critical context

hds-banner-color-informational.description: banner background color for informational context

hds-banner-color-success.description: banner background color for success context

hds-banner-color-warning.description: banner background color for warning context

hds-banner-color-icon_warning.description: banner icon color for warning context

hds-banner-color-text_critical.description: banner text color for critical context

hds-banner-color-text_informational.description: banner text color for informational context

hds-banner-color-text_success.description: banner text color for success context

hds-banner-color-text_warning.description: banner text color for warning context

hds-article_card-color-text_title_hover_.description: h3e article card title text hover color

hds-article_card-color-text_title_press_.description: h3e article card title text press color

hds-text_input-color-text_disabled.description: helper text, disabled icon & text color

hds-text_input-color-text.description: input label, input filled & read-only text color

hds-tab-color-active_h3e.description: h3e tab color for active text, hover text, and active border

hds-tab-color-pressed_h3e.description: h3e tab color for pressed text & border

hds-tab-color-active_cc.description: cc tab color for active text, hover text, and active border

hds-tab-color-pressed_cc.description: cc tab color for pressed text & border

hds-tab-color-active_h3f.description: h3f tab color for active text, hover text, and active border

hds-tab-color-pressed_h3f.description: h3f tab color for pressed text & border

hds-radio-color-text_disabled.description: text color for disabled radio label

hds-nav_slider-color-icon_hover.description: nav slider icon hover & press color

hds-links-color-press.description: pressed text & icon link color (standalone & inline)

hds-links-text-inline.description: Any inline link should mirror the body text, add underline and apply the hds-color-links token

hds-label-border_radius.description: label border radius for all sizes

hds-label-color-text_critical.description: label text & icon color for critical context

hds-label-color-text-status_informationa.description: label text & icon color for informational context

hds-label-color-text-status_success.description: label text & icon color for success context

hds-label-color-icon-status_success.description: label icon color for success context

hds-label-color-text-status_warning.description: label text & icon color for warning context

hds-divider-section.description: used for section divider in a page

hds-chips-border_radius.description: chips border radius for all sizes

hds-chips-border_width.description: chips border width for all sizes

hds-checkbox-color-text_disabled.description: text color for disabled checkbox label

hds-carousel_indicator-color-active_h3e.description: color for active h3e carousel indicator

hds-carousel_indicator-color-active_cc.description: color for active cc carousel indicator

hds-carousel_indicator-color-active_h3f.description: color for active h3f carousel indicator

hds-carousel_indicator-inactive.description: opactiy for all inactive carousel indicator

hds-button-color-hover_h3e.description: h3e button color for hover state

hds-button-color-press_h3e.description: h3e ripple effect color when pressing primary button

hds-button-color-ripple_h3e.description: h3e ripple effect color when pressing secondary & plain button

hds-button-color-hover_h3f.description: h3f button color for hover state

hds-button-color-press_h3f.description: h3f ripple effect color when pressing primary button

hds-button-color-ripple_h3f.description: h3f ripple effect color when pressing secondary & plain button

hds-button-color-hover_cc.description: cc button color for hover state

hds-button-color-press_cc.description: cc ripple effect color when pressing primary button

hds-button-color-ripple_cc.description: cc ripple effect color when pressing secondary & plain button

hds-button-color-text_primary.description: text & icon color for primary button

hds-button-color-text_secondary_h3e.description: text & icon color for h3e secondary & plain button

hds-button-color-text_hover_secondary_h3.description: text & icon color for h3e secondary & plain button hover state

hds-button-color-text_press_secondary_h3.description: text & icon color for h3e secondary & plain button press/tap state

hds-button-color-text_secondary_h3f.description: text & icon color for h3f secondary & plain button

hds-button-color-text_hover_secondary_h3.description: text & icon color for h3f secondary & plain button hover state

hds-button-color-text_press_secondary_h3.description: text & icon color for h3f secondary & plain button press state

hds-button-color-text_secondary_cc.description: text & icon color for cc secondary & plain button

hds-button-color-text_hover_secondary_cc.description: text & icon color for cc secondary & plain button hover state

hds-button-color-text_press_secondary_cc.description: text & icon color for cc secondary & plain button press state

hds-button-color-disabled.description: background color for button disabled state

hds-button-color-text_disabled.description: text & icon color for button disabled state

hds-button-border_radius.description: border radius for all button sizes

hds-button-border_width.description: border width for all secondary button sizes

hds-breadcrumb-color-text_currentpage_li.description: breadcrumb current page text & icon color on light background

hds-breadcrumb-color-text_currentpage_da.description: breadcrumb current page text & icon color on dark background

hds-text-color-primary.description: Default text color. Used as the main text color throughout the UI. Provides good and legible contrast for our content.

hds-text-color-weak.description: Weak text color for HanoApp. Used for e.g. introduction paragraphs and help texts that are coupled with form elements.

hds-text-color-weaker.description: Weaker text color for HanoApp. Used for e.g. disabled button label, footers, table headings, captions and placeholder texts.

hds-text-color-weakest.description: Weakest text color for HanoApp. Used for e.g. disabled input text and placeholder text in focused inputs.

hds-text-color-on_accent.description: Default text on accent color for HanoApp. Used when text sits on a dark background.

hds-text-color-cta_h3e.description: This is primary CTA text for h3e e.g: button label, text/nude button

hds-text-color-cta_h3f.description: This is primary CTA text for h3f e.g: button label, text/nude button

hds-text-color-cta_cc.description: This is primary CTA text for CC e.g: button label, text/nude button

hds-text-color-insurance_info.description: Default link text for any information related to Insurance

hds-text-color-critical.description: Default text color for status: Critical.

hds-text-color-warning.description: Default text color for status: Warning.

hds-text-color-informational.description: Default text color for status: Informational.

hds-text-color-success.description: Default text color for status: Success.

hds-icon-color.description: Default icon color. Used as the main icon color throughout the UI. Provides good and legible contrast for our content.

hds-border-color-strong.description: Stronger border color for HanoApp for highlighting specific parts in the UI.

hds-border-color_hover.description: Default border hover color for HanoApp.

hds-border-color_disabled.description: Default border disabled color for HanoApp.

hds-border-color-active.description: Default border color for active state. Used for e.g. Focused text inputs.

hds-border-color-error.description: Default border color for error state.

hds-background-color-overlay.description: Default overlay color for HanoApp. Use this to distinguish modal and popout layers from the layer underneath.

hds-background-color.description: Default application background color for HanoApp. Should be set to either html or body element.

hds-surface-color.description: Default application surface color for HanoApp. Use this for e.g. card backgrounds.

hds-surface-color-disabled.description: Disabled surface color for HanoApp. Use this for e.g. disabled button, chips.

hds-surface-color-raised.description: Default raised surface color for HanoApp. Use this when you need to separate a specific layer from the surface color.

hds-status-color-critical_weak.description: Secondary color for status: Critical. Can be used for status background.

hds-status-color-warning_weak.description: Secondary color for status: Warning. Can be used for status background.

hds-status-color-informational_weak.description: Secondary color for status: Informational. Can be used for status background.

hds-status-color-success_weak.description: Secondary color for status: Success. Can be used for status background.

hds-fontFamily-Inter.description: Inter is the default UI font family utilized by all our applications.

hds-line-height-tight.description: This token can be used when you dont want line height taking any extra space.

hds-line-height-heading.description: This is the default line height for headings.

hds-line-height-caption.description: This is the default line height for captions, hint texts and form errors.

hds-line-height-body.description: This is the default line height for body text.

hds-font-weight.description: Default font weight for body text - 400

hds-font-weight-active.description: Default font weight for active items - 500

hds-box-shadow.description: Default box shadow. Used with buttons, active states, and such.

hds-box-shadow-header.description: Default box shadow for any element that presents on the head on the screen e.g. appheader.

hds-box-shadow-footer.description: Default box shadow for any element that presents on the bottom on the screen e.g. bottomsheet, appmenu.

hds-box-shadow-card.description: Default box shadow for card component that creates drop shadow, raised surface, and a border around the card.

hds-box-shadow-card_hover.description: Default hover box shadow for card component that creates drop shadow, raised surface, and a border around the card.

hds-box-shadow-popout.description: Default box shadow to be used with all pop out windows.

hds-box-shadow-modal.description: Default box shadow for modal components. Used in dialogs, modals and such.

hds-border-width-200.description: This is medium border width. Can be used e.g. active text input

hds-border-radius-pill.description: This is for creating pill shaped tags and similar
